snippet: The officer was walking to her car in a parking garage in the Bronx early Wednesday morning when the man grabbed at her purse and punched her.
abstract: Off-duty police officer in Bronx is attacked by man who steals department-issued handgun from her purse; assault illustrates why officers are told not to carry weapons in anything other than holsters on their bodies.

byline.contributor: Al Baker and J. David Goodman contributed reporting. Susan C. Beachy contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The officer was walking to her car in a parking garage in the Bronx early Wednesday morning when the man grabbed at her purse and punched her.

headline.main: Off-Duty New York Police Officer Robbed of Gun After Attack
headline.print_headline: An Off-Duty Police Officer Is Robbed of Her Gun After Being Attacked in the Bronx
